name: Danger Ducklings (itch)
description:
WASD to move your ducks, if you'd like the intended mobile experience you can play it on testflight here: https://testflight.apple.com/join/rP92FGaU or find it on the google play store by searching "Danger Ducklings"

Thanks for playing!
